schema:name.description: text label for the term that is useful to human user

propertyID.description: identifier for the identifier schema, e.g. DOI, ARK.  Get values from https://registry.identifiers.org/registry/ for interoperability

properties.description: web-resolveable string for the identifier; host name part is location of a resolver that will return some representation for the given identifier value. E.g. https://doi.org/10.5066/F7VX0DMQ

schema:inDefinedTermSet.description: Identifier for the controlled vocabulary responsible for this keyword.

schema:termCode.description: A representative code for this keyword in the controlled vocabulary (Optional).  Analogous to skos:Notation
